item.name: MySQL Aborted_connects

The number of bytes received from all clients.
It requires user parameter mysql.status[*], which is defined in userparameter_mysql.conf.

trigger.name: MySQL Slave replication falling behind more than 60 seconds
MySQL Slave_IO_Running Status is not Yes
MySQL Slave_SQL_Running Status is not Yes
